talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Were you waiting for me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
You're here only now. Did you crawl your way here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$His Past$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm here because of that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
You're always late. Do you know what's going on right now?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's a Nest.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
So you're here knowing something's wrong too. That would speed up our conversation.
So what is this strange phenomenon about?
I hope you're here with at least some information.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Nests are like powerful <FONT color=#a82424>force fields</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
A Nest?
Hmm... I think I've heard of it before. A private territory created by powerful creatures.
I heard that the dragon from your world also made a Nest once.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>For a Nest of this size, I'm sure it's Hirendel's.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
It has become impossible for us to travel to many areas in Chiron Island compared to the past. Does that have something to do with the Nest too?
What a headache.
So is it Hirendel who made the Nest?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Not really. I've entered Nests before.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
If Nests are similar to force fields, I'm more worried about the future.
The island was already more or less out of bounds because of Childs' vigilance and now it has turned into an impenetrable fortress.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I need something that is related to Hirendel. Something that Hirendel is deeply <FONT color=#a82424>attached</FONT> to would be good.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
You're more capable than I thought.
So how do you enter a Nest?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Something Hirendel is strongly attached to... I have something in my mind.
Hirendel wasn't a powerful Child from the beginning.
As you may recall, Childs grow stronger by absorbing other Childs' jewels.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So you're saying I can find something he was fond of in that place?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
There's a place called Old Garden where Hirendel used to live before he became as powerful as he is now.
He used to hide himself there from Childs who were eyeing his jewel.
Maybe you can find one of his belongings there.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It depends on how attached he was to the item. I'll go and see what I can find first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Right. Your brain is working now.
He stayed there for quite a long time so I'm sure you can find one or two of his prized possessions.
What do you think? Do you think you can enter the Nest with that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I need Hirendel's item to be processed into something like a key that can penetrate his Nest.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Tell me if you need anything else. I'll prepare it while you're gone.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How do I go to Old Garden?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
You can leave me with that.
Now head over to Old Garden.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>All right.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
I'll let Captain Hector know you're coming.
He'll guide you.

$Precious Flower$
What a pretty flower.
It looks like someone grew it with much love and care.

$Merchant April$
You should go and meet President Vernicka.
He has been staring at you all along.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
What brings you here?
I think it's Vernicka you should meet, not me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm ready.</html>
<html>Are we leaving right away? Hold on a second.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Captain Hector$
Vernicka told me about you.
I'll take you to where Hirendel used to live so get ready.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>[Go]</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merca's Captain Hector$
Okay, I'll send you there now.

※ You will enter “Old Garden" where Hirendel used to live.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
Looks like you're not ready yet.
Come and find me when you are.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
You have company.
You can only enter Old Garden alone.

※ You cannot proceed in a party.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
It looks like you have some stuff to complete first.
I'll wait for you.

※ You cannot enter during Rumble Mode or Ladder Matching.

$Precious Flower$
It's a pretty flower but Hirendel's repulsive energy can be felt from it.

$President Vernicka$
What are you doing here? Don't you have work to do?

$Merchant April$
I heard you were on your way to Old Garden.
Go and meet Captain Hector now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I can feel Hirendel's energy from this flower.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Did you bring that thing in your hand from Old Garden?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sure that's the case since this flower had the strongest remnant energy of Hirendel.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Hmm... It has been quite some time since Hirendel left that place but this flower still looks well maintained.
It almost feels like the flower is reeking his stench.
But looking at how pretty it is, it seems like Hirendel adored that flower.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Have you found a way to make the key? If you don't know how, then...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Now all we need to do is to create a key to the Nest using that flower.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$President Vernicka$
Have you forgotten that I'm the head of Merca?
I can't possibly keep my job if I am not capable of such things.
Go and find April. She'll make you the thing you need.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>[Return to Merca's Heart]</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Where the Precious Flower was found$
Hirendel's energy can still be felt from here.

$Merchant April$
President Vernicka is looking for you, {user_nick}.
Please go and find him now.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
It looks like you've made a successful trip to Old Garden.
Go to Vernicka now. He's waiting for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How long do you think it will take to make the key?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant April$
I was waiting for you. Can you give me the item you found?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A potion? <FONT color=#7e12d2>(April is busily moving about.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant April$
I've done some preparations while you were away.
So it will be ready soon. By the way, it isn't a key but a potion.
I just have to add a drop of this and a little pinch of that and…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is it going well? <FONT color=#7e12d2>(April seems too engrossed to answer.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant April$
……Hmm.
I'll just add a little finishing touch…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive Rewards)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant April$
I'm done!
Phew. This is the first time I worked on something so complicated but I'm happy with the results.

$Precious Flower$
Hirendel's energy can still be felt.

$President Vernicka$
Haven't I told you to go to April?
Quit wasting time and hurry up.

$Merca's Captain Hector$
It looks like you've made a successful trip to Old Garden.
Go to Vernicka now. He's waiting for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This one looks different from the other plants.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Precious Flower$
A flower is carefully wrapped like it is being protected.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is it! Hirendel must have taken care of this flower with much affection.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Precious Flower$
Upon closer look, Hirendel's energy can be felt.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>[Return to Merca's Heart]</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Precious Flower$
Carefully take the flower that contains Hirendel's energy.

$President Vernicka$
Shouldn't you be at Old Garden now?
Ah, so you failed. Maybe you'll be successful if you try it again from the beginning.

$Captain Hector$
You're back empty-handed?
To go to Old Garden again, you should do everything again from the beginning.

$Merchant April$
I heard you were on your way to Old Garden.
Go and meet Captain Hector now.
But maybe you need to do everything all over again from the beginning...

qstep_change.comment: 월드존에서는 매칭 상태를 검사할 필요가 없다.

journal.title: Vernicka's Information
journal.contents:
Go to President Vernicka and collect information about the Nest.

Merca's Heart - President Vernicka
journal.destination: Talk to Vernicka at Merca's Heart

journal.title: Hirendel's Past
journal.contents:
Talk to Merca's Captain Hector to go to Old Garden where Hirendel used to live.

Merca's Heart - Captain Hector
journal.destination: Go to Old Garden with Captain Hector's help
journal.todo_msg: Go to Old Garden by talking to Captain Hector in Merca's Heart.

journal.title: Precious Item
journal.contents:
Find something related to Hirendel in Old Garden and bring it back.

Old Garden - ??

journal.title: Key to Nest
journal.contents:
Take the flower you found in Old Garden back to President Vernicka.

Merca's Heart - President Vernicka
journal.destination: Talk to Vernicka at Merca's Heart
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Vernicka at Merca's Heart.

journal.title: Entering the Nest
journal.contents:
Get help from April so that you can enter the Nest.

Merca's Heart - Merchant April
journal.destination: Talk to April at Merca's Heart
journal.todo_msg: Talk to April at Merca's Heart.
